name: vampire
description: A pale, gaunt figure with sharp fangs and glowing red eyes. Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living to sustain their immortality. Ancient creatures of legend, with stories of their existence dating back to ancient civilizations. They are often depicted as noble or aristocratic figures who prey on the living to maintain their immortality.

powers.name: Immortality
powers.description: Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living to sustain their immortality.

powers.name: Hypnotic gaze
powers.description: When it commands you, roll +Cool. On a 10+, you can choose whether to do it or not. If you do, mark experience and take +1 forward. On a 7-9, you can choose whether you do it or not. If you do, mark experience. If you donâ€™t, take +1 the next time it tries to mesmerize you. On a miss, you do what it asks.

powers.name: Shape-shifting into a bat or mist
powers.description: Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living to sustain their immortality.

powers.name: Superhuman strength and speed
powers.description: Vampires are undead creatures that feed on the blood of the living to sustain their immortality.

powers.name: Regeneration
powers.description: victims bitten three times become vampires themselves.

powers.name: Vampiric Bite
powers.description: When a vampire bites a victim, they must Act Under Pressure or be mesmerized, unable to act for a moment.

powers.name: Master Vampire
powers.description: The Vampire controls all the vampires they has created.

weakness: must rest in a coffin with soil from their homeland
signs: Pale, drained corpses with puncture wounds on the neck
Sightings of a bat or mist moving unnaturally
Reports of a charming stranger with an aversion to sunlight

name: mosekonen
description: a female spirit associated with fog and mist. She's said to brew the mist that rises from marshes and moors.

powers.name: Shapeshifting
powers.description: Can transform into a wolf-like creature, especially during the full moon.

powers.name: Enhanced Senses
powers.description: Heightened smell, hearing, and night vision in both human and wolf form.

powers.name: Regeneration
powers.description: Rapid healing of wounds, except those caused by silver.

powers.name: Pack Mentality
powers.description: Can communicate telepathically with other werewolves in their pack.

weakness: inability to control transformation during full moon
signs: Animal attacks coinciding with the full moon
Claw marks on trees or buildings

name: myling
description: The ghost of an unbaptized child, often said to chase lone travelers at night, demanding to be baptized and buried properly.

powers.name: Intangibility
powers.description: Can pass through solid objects and walls.

powers.name: Invisibility
powers.description: Can become invisible at will, though may be visible to certain individuals or under specific circumstances.

powers.name: Possession
powers.description: Can temporarily take control of a living being's body.

powers.name: Telekinesis
powers.description: Ability to move objects without physical contact.

signs: Recurring nightmares about a specific person or event
